-- Do this before loading data. Otherwise it takes very long.

-- Enable Synapse Link in Arure via portal, Prowershell or CLI
-- Powershell
-- Update-AzCosmosDBAccount -Name "my-cosmos-db" -ResourceGroupName "my-rg" -EnableAnalyticalStorage 1
-- cli
-- az cosmosdb update --name my-cosmos-db --resource-group my-rg --enable-analytical-storage true

-- Next select wicht containers you want to replicate in analytics container
-- Powershell
-- New-AzCosmosDBSqlContainer -ResourceGroupName "my-rg" -AccountName "my-cosmos-db" -DatabaseName "my-db" -Name "my-container" -PartitionKeyKind "hash" -PartitionKeyPath "/customer" -AnalyticalStorageTtl -1
-- cli
-- az cosmosdb sql container create --resource-group my-rg --account-name my-cosmos-db --database-name my-db --name my-container --partition-key-path "/productID" --analytical-storage-ttl -1

-- Next in Synapse studio create link to external data source
